pages.text: $(li)The Bone Serpent Tooth is an item that can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/alexsmobs/lava_vision)Potion of Lava Vision$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can only be dropped by a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/bone_serpent)Bone Serpent$(/l).
